data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Do this: Before starting the UV unwrapping job, cut your mesh by creating as many material indexes as you need, you can even assign each one a different color so you can be sure that there is no face orphan. Once ____ have ____ mesh ____ cut ____ sliced ( so ____ speak ) you ____ in Face Select Mode, ____ switch ____ Edit Mode, ____ the ____ containing ____ faces ____ want ____ unwrap, press 'Select ', leave Edit Mode ____ Voile! You ____ have ____ entirely ____ face ____ waiting ____ you ____ unwrap. No more manual (and imprecise) face selection is needed.
data.partBlankContent: Do this: Before starting the UV unwrapping job, cut your mesh by creating as many material indexes as you need, you can even assign each one a different color so you can be sure that there is no face orphan. Once y__ have t__ mesh a__ cut a__ sliced ( so t_ speak ) you en___ in Face Select Mode, th__ switch in__ Edit Mode, sel___ the in___ containing t__ faces y__ want t_ unwrap, press 'Select ', leave Edit Mode a__ Voile! You n__ have a_ entirely use___ face gr___ waiting f__ you t_ unwrap. No more manual (and imprecise) face selection is needed.
data.answer: 这样做:在开始UV展开工作之前，通过创建尽可能多的材料索引来分割你的网格，你甚至可以分配每个不同的颜色，这样你可以确保没有无用的面部选择。一旦你有了所有的网格切割和切片(所以说)，你进入面部选择模式，然后切换到编辑模式，选择包含你想要展开的面部的索引，按“选择”，离开编辑模式，然后，现在您有一个完全有用的面组等待您展开。不需要更多的手动(和不精确的)面部选择。
